message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $135.
I'm still a bit far from $135. Can you meet me at $125?
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Can you meet me at $125?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $128.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'd love to get a better deal. Can you meet me at $125?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $129.
I really want this product, but I've reached my budget limit. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. That's my final offer.
